company_page.description: In Greek mythology, Metis was the Titan of prudence, good council, planning, advice, deep thought, craftiness and wisdom.

elena.intro: Blockchain KOL, Co-Founder of CryptoChicks, the world largest female blockchain community with members spanning over 56 countries.

yuan.intro: Veteran Ethereum developer. Involved in the framework design of the IBM Hyperledger project. OR expert.

kevin.intro: Former global business leader of a tier-1 public blockchain. Researcher and practitioner of the Token Economy, DAO and the governance protocols. A serails startup entrepreneur.

stone_age.title: Stone Age
stone_age.description: Building up the cornerstone for Metis Protocol with the Genesis version of White Paper, Purple Paper, Meta Staking Contract, the POC ComCo Management Framework, and Initial Funding.

bronze_age.title: Bronze Age
bronze_age.description:
Project cold launch
Public test net launch
Founding members join and use Metis Protocol to stake, govern and manage for their projects manually to mint M Token incentives
API connection with Defi projects and joint promotion with Defi communities
Launch POC version using Layer 2 of OR

Iron_age.title: Iron Age
Iron_age.description:
Main net launch with Layer 2 solution
Support DACs to issue their own tokens
DApps/Community onboard program
Microservice tools community development program
